shortDescription: I am a software engineer specialized in building scalable backend systems. I also dabble in a little bit of frontend. Currently, I am working at Amazon as a Software Developer Engineer.
aboutMe:
Hi, I am Nihal Mittal currently working at Amazon as a Software Developer. I work on a variety of payment products for Amazon Japan customers. 
My interests lie in Backend Development, Distributed Systems, and Open Source software. I like to build anything that lives on the web ranging from chrome extensions to full-fledged web apps.
My weapon of choice for the front end is usually NextJS and sometimes VueJS. I also like to contribute to open-source projects and have a few projects of my own that you can check out in the projects section.
name: Nihal Mittal
